utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well that thing is clearing in the way! All right. Ah-ha! Ah-ah!! Damn fridge!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi Joey, how ya doin’?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Great! Roomie!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Huh, yeah I guess we are roommates now.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Well, now that you brought it up, our fridge is broken. We have to get a new one. Now, I checked around and your half is $400. Thanks a lot.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m not paying for half of that! I’m only staying here until my apartment gets fixed.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look Rach, my parents bought this fridge just after I was born, okay? Now, I have never had a problem with it. Then you show up and it breaks! What does that tell ya’?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That refrigerators don’t live as long as people.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, now you know that the ATM will only lets you take out 300 at a time, I’ll take a check for the other hundred.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You’re jokin’ right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Of course I’m jokin’! I don’t take checks.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank God you’re pretty.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hi! Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Do you guys know any cute guys?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, of course I do! My good friend Joey over here.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I’m sorry. Thank you Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Anyway, there’s this big charity ball this weekend and Ralph Lauren bought a table, so I kinda have to go…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What’s the charity?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know, something either trees or disease—Ralph mumbles a lot.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Does Ralph mumble when you’re not paying attention?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! It’s weird. But the thing is need to find a date.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, what kind of guy are you looking for?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, someone that has his own tux, or has the ability to rent a tux.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So he has to be a male who has at least $50.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh! So close.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey everybody!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey uh, this is Elizabeth.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Oh hi!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: I’m the student.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Isn’t she cute? No!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y’know, this is probably none of my business, but weren’t you guys supposed to not be seen in public together?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Oh, we’re not together.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh no-no-no, we’re just two people who happen to run into each other here at the coffee house.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, sly.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Well, I really wanted to meet you guys, but I have to run. I’ll see you later?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Bye Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Oops! I did not mean to run into you like that sir.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh that is quite all right ma’am.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, why is she leaving? Is it a school night and she has a lot of homework to do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, her molecular epidemiology paper is due tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, tell her good luck with that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Anyone else? Huh? Bring ‘em on!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oo! When’s her birthday?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don’t know Rachel, why?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, y’know it’s just been so long since I’ve been to Chuckie Cheese.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I like Elizabeth.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well thanks!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. In fact, I like her so much you tell her I want my cookies early this year! Y’know, a box of Thin Mints and some Tag-a-Longs.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey come on you guys, give him a break. Ross, seriously, how’s it going with her?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, actually it’s been great. She’s 20 so she’s not looking for anything too serious, which is perfect for me right now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well that is great. And seriously, she seems very nice.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks. I know you guys like to give me a hard time and all, but it really means a lot to me that you like her. Just knowing that you guys are…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, I got a good one. Okay, umm, what is she? Like 12?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, do you think we talk about our relationship enough?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah. Do we have any Fruit Roll-Ups?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, I just thought of the perfect guy for Rachel to take to her thing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh that’s so funny because we found someone too.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh that’s good, I guess she’ll have a choice between my guy and your weirdo.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why would our guy be a weirdo?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: ‘Cause that’s just your taste.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel is not going to pick your stupid guy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: My guy is a lawyer who has volunteer work. And, he has one of these

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: A face ass?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: A chin dimple!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, uh y’know, our guy works with Chandler and he’s really nice and smart and he’s a great dresser!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Have you seen your guy’s body?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, our guy is just a floating head.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well my guy is spectacular. Okay? He’s a massage client and one time umm, when he was on the table, I looked at it. And I mean all of it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You’re not supposed to look!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah, like there are police for that!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wait! You look? You-you massaged me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right fine, your guy may have a great body, but our guy is really funny.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, Chandler funny?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Our guy’s a great dancer!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: My guy is well read.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Our guy has great hair.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: My guy has great teeth!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Our guy smells incredible.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you want our guy to be your guy?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Huh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, you…don’t look good Joe.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The fridge broke. I have to eat everything. Cold cuts, ice cream, limes—Hey, what was in that brown jar?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That’s still in there?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Not anymore. So anyway, how do you want to pay me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is this a service you’re providing me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No! No! For my new fridge—our new fridge!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Our new fridge? I don’t live here anymore.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So what? Look, suppose we were a divorced couple.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And I got custody of the kid, right? Now suppose the kid dies and-and I gotta buy a new kid.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Give me $400!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Professor Geller?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hmm? Oh, a student I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: I was wondering if I could talk to you for a moment?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, yes of course, what-what would this be regarding?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Making out in your office.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Shh! Of course, why don’t we go inside?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh-ooh!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Doorknob! Doorknob!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Oh! Sorry! Umm, I actually do need to talk to you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, okay. What-what about?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Spring vacation.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Spring vacation.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Yeah, we have time off and a lot of people are going on trips…

utterance.speaker: Professor Feesen
utterance.content: Professor Geller!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, professor Feesen-sen-stenlger… I’ll be with you in one moment. So, I will take one box of the Thin Mints.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You don’t understand! Elizabeth was about to ask me to go on a trip with her! Is that taking it slow?! No, I’m not ready for this! Okay? What-what do I tell her?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Just tell her the truth! Tell her you’re not ready.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can do that. Oh-oh, what if she gets upset?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Then you distract her with a Barbie doll.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Or! You can just, y’know…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What the hell are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What? What the hell am I doing? You just broke my fridge!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! What? How do you, how do you even know its broken?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-ho-ho, you think I don’t know what breaks my fridge? Excuse me! Well what do you know! Broken! That’ll be $400!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey, I saw you push him!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You pushed him!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey, I did not break this! Okay? That has been broken for a while.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right. Chandler, do you remember how I told you about our fridge?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I still haven’t gotten a check for your half yet.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Do not give him any money!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m not talking to you! You broke my fridge!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: You wanted to see me Professor Geller?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes. Yes! Please, come in.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oo-oo!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Doorknob?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, it kinda grows on you. Actually, I wanted to finish talking to you about uh, spring vacation.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Oh good.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I… Look, I’m having a great time with you and I just don’t want us to move to fast or put to much pressure on us. So, I’m sorry I just don’t think we should go away together yet. It’s-it’s too soon.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Ross, I think you misunderstood what I was saying. I just wanted to tell you that I’m going to Florida for a couple weeks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. I think you misunderstood what I was saying. What I meant was…

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: You are so adorable.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That! Let’s talk about that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! How did it go with Elizabeth?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh? Oh-oh, it was fine. Uh, it was just a misunderstanding. She didn’t want me to go with her. She just wanted to let me know that she’s going to Florida for spring vacation.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wait a minute, is she going for spring vacation or is she going for spring break?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What’s-what’s the difference?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, spring vacation is doing nice things with your grandparents. Spring break you’re doing frat guys.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, y’know what? Not all spring breaks are like that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What did you do on yours?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I went to Egypt with my dad.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can see it now, "Look dad, it’s the Sphinx!"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, I think Elizabeth is a little more serious than, "Spring break!" All right? I mean she’s taken my class!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And slept with the professor.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m gonna call her.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! You guys umm, I want you to meet Sebastian.

utterance.speaker: Sebastian
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We just uh, we just met at the newsstand. We both grabbed for the last Field Stream. What? I read that.

utterance.speaker: Sebastian
utterance.content: Can I get you a cup of coffee?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yes! Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rachel, what the hell is this?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You ask us to find you a guy and you come traipsing in here with your own!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You found me a guy?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes! We found you a really cute and funny guy from Chandler’s work!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah and I-I found you one too who is not a weirdo.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, y’know what though you guys? I really appreciate that but I think I’m just gonna take Sebastian to the charity.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you sure?! Because our guy smells incredible!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh, would you stop it with that already?!

utterance.speaker: Sebastian
utterance.content: Here you go.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Sebastian
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So, Sebastian, do you do any volunteer work?

utterance.speaker: Sebastian
utterance.content: Uh, no not really. Why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No reason, it’s just I know a single guy that cares about other people.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you funny?

utterance.speaker: Sebastian
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What are you guys doing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you funny? Tell us a joke!

utterance.speaker: Sebastian
utterance.content: Look, I just wanted to have coffee with Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, so do a lot of people.

utterance.speaker: Sebastian
utterance.content: Actually, I uh, I gotta get going. Give me a call sometime.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, but y’know, no, you didn’t give me your phone number.

utterance.speaker: Sebastian
utterance.content: Okay! See you later!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Turns out he is kinda funny.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I cannot believe you guys! He was really nice and he left because of you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, but Sebastian? What is that? A cat’s name?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, y’know what I noticed Rachel? He scares easy. Is that the kind of guy you’d like to take to a ball? "Hey Sebastian, would you like to dance?" "Uhh, okay—I gotta go!"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right guys stop it. Rachel, we’re very sorry that is a very insensitive thing for us to do. And y’know what? Let us make it up to you, we have two really great guys for you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! What have you got to lose? Y’know you might even end up with someone really special if you pick my guy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, so you will meet our guys?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, I’ll meet ‘em.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay now it doesn’t matter which one you choose, y’know? It’s completely up to you. Our guy is perfect, or you can go out with the guy Phoebe deemed not good enough to go out with herself.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pheebs! There you are! Okay, you broke my fridge; you owe me 400 bucks!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay sure!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ooh, technically you owe me $600 for sending out happy thoughts on your last ten auditions.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Call it even?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, there you are! So what did Elizabeth say?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, it turns out that she is going to Daytona for spring break woo-hoo. That means, that means wet T-shirt contests, guys doing shots off of girl’s bodies, waking up next to people you don’t even know…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Man, she is going to have a great time! Is she staying at the Hotel Corona?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know the hotels?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure! I was there! Spring Break ’81! Woo-hoo!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: In 1981 you were 13!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So what? I drove down, sold T-shirts, had a blast. And y’know who knows how to party? Drunk college chicks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, she can’t go.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ross, you can’t tell her not to go. You just started dating.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Then what am I supposed to do?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nothing, you just have to be cool with it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, what is she goes down and-and sleeps with a bunch of guys?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, maybe you don’t marry this one.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m so glad you’re going on this trip!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Yeah! I’ve been working so hard this semester. I really need to go crazy y’know, blow off some steam.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure. Sure. Look I don’t, I don’t know if your plans are finalized yet, but umm, hey I-I know another great way to blow off steam.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you into crafts at all?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Ross, are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, yeah, of-of course I’m okay! What? I’m just being supportive. Supportive of you and this whole trip, and-and what-what is uh, what’s this?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: It’s a bathing suit?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: To wear in front of people?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Is that supportive?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is this?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Good-good-good-good.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We’re really glad you decided to meet our guy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You’re gonna like him so much. So umm, when do you want to meet him?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don’t know. I know I don’t work late tomorrow night.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Tomorrow night is good. Tomorrow night is good, but uh, y’know what? Why put off something till tomorrow that you can do right now? Eldad come here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Eldad, this is Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Eldad
utterance.content: How are you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well-well a little blind sided but y’know good.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Eldad, sit down. Move over! Move over now!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I—Ohh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: There you go! There you are!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay! Okay! We can take a hint! What are you doing here?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This is Patrick.

utterance.speaker: Patrick
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi. Okay, you’re too late okay? Because she’s already with our guy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God, you’re right! I am too late; they’re sitting on the couch and talking! Come on! Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This is Patrick.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, hi.

utterance.speaker: Patrick
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, this is the guy I was telling you about.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. And believe me, this suit does not do justice to what’s underneath it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh-okay, but Pheebs?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m just sort of in the middle of something.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! Okay! Yeah, that’s okay. Have a seat.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! You can’t do that!

utterance.speaker: Eldad
utterance.content: Maybe I should go!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sit down! We’re winning!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, y’know what? Maybe I should go!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: No-no-no-no! Have a seat! Have a seat!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel! Rachel! You haven’t touched Eldad’s hair!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It is the softest hair! Touch it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I’m good.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rachel? Patrick is really rich. Give her some money.

utterance.speaker: Patrick
utterance.content: Y’know what Phoebe? This isn’t really worth the free massage.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s right Patrick, bye-bye!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Eldad is much more cooperative! And he can dance! You dance for Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No-no! Don’t dance for me! Please? Don’t! What is the matter with you guys?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, okay, let’s talk it out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I… Am I the only one that this is embarrassing for?

utterance.speaker: Eldad
utterance.content: I’m a little embarrassed.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’ll tell ya who should be embarrassed! It’s you guys! Come on! This is ridiculous! Thank you very much, but I do not need you to get me a date!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Then why did she ask us to…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I am still talking!! And then you chase away the one guy that I actually liked! I mean, no offense to you guys. Really! I mean congratulations on all the cash, and-and y’know——Wow! You do have very soft hair! But I would much rather go to the ball all by myself than go through anymore of this! Good-bye! Now do you use some sort of special conditioner on that hair?!

utterance.speaker: Eldad
utterance.content: Yes, Papaya Extract.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So uh, have a great time down there.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: I will.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. And did you, did you pack that bathing suit?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It was pretty funny when I, when I hid it for a while, huh? Anyway, umm, I-I am worried about that bathing suit, not because it’s revealing which I’m fine with, no I’m concerned about your health, sun exposure.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Oh, don’t worry I have plenty of sun block, it’s SPF-30.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, if what’s in the bottle is actually 30. I mean sometimes you get 30, sometimes it’s-it’s get 4, and I swear to God more often than not it’s just milk.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Ross, it’s going to be okay. I’m not going down there to hook up with a bunch of guys. I really like you. I like how things are going between us.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Yeah! I’m just going down there to relax and hang out with my friends.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Cool.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Oh hey! Here they are!

utterance.speaker: Guy
utterance.content: Elizabeth!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Call me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rachel, we’re sorry for pushing those guys on you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh that’s all right! Y’know, I ended up having a really good time. Y’know, the charity was a big success and they raised a lot of money and awareness.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So what was it for anyway?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I wanna say a disease.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I just got this really weird message from Ross. He said turn on MTV.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Huh. All right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God, look! That’s Elizabeth!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh-oh Professor Geller.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ahh, to be 13 again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.
